Summary: 4 different encounters saw lights and bird like craft large and glowing
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking for shooting stars and I said "look at the plane" then my 2 friends and I notices it was a disk and didn't make any noise and appeared to be looking at us and then it flew away to the west and went across the sky in about 5 seconds then I saw the same thing but maybe 2 miles out and there was 2 of them and the last encounter we were looking for it and we saw a bird like thing come out of no where very bright glowing and went about 10 miles in 7 seconds
